pr_title: First version of the PR template

timeline.message:
First version of the PR template

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

timeline.author: jandadav
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+# Description
+
+Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context. List any dependencies that are required for this change.
+
+Fixes # (issue)
+
+## Type of change
+
+Please delete options that are not relevant.
+
+- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
+- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
+- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
+- [ ] This change requires a documentation update
+
+# How Has This Been Tested?

replies.bodyText: I am actually fine with removing the How has this been tested section as we require automated tests
replies.author: balhar-jakub

timeline.bodyText: Maybe reduce the checklist and link to the contributing.md...
timeline.author: jandadav
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+# Description
+
+Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed. Please also include relevant motivation and context. List any dependencies that are required for this change.
+
+Fixes # (issue)
+
+## Type of change
+
+Please delete options that are not relevant.
+
+- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
+- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
+- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
+- [ ] This change requires a documentation update
+
+# How Has This Been Tested?
+
+Please describe the tests that you ran to verify your changes. Provide instructions so we can reproduce. 
+
+- [ ] Test A
+- [ ] Test B
+
+
+# Checklist:

replies.bodyText:
I am not sure.
On one hand it will remove the duplication of the text.
On the other hand this makes it simple to follow for the developer creating the PR
replies.author: balhar-jakub

replies.bodyText: I'm for keeping this as well, easier to follow. But maybe link also the contributing.md that contains valuable info about for instance keeping PR as small as possible etc..
replies.author: taban03

timeline.message:
Remove how has this been tested section

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Added more information about the contributing

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>
